ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He certainly has the power to return him to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God has certainly power to bring him back (from the dead).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely He (the Creator) has the power to bring him back (to life).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has all power to resurrect him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed Allah is Able to return him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, He is Able to bring him back!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely He is able to return him (to life).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely He is able to bring him back
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! He verily is Able to return him (unto life)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He certainly has the power to bring him back to life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily He is Able to restore him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed He is able to bring him back [after death],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, (Allah) is Able to bring him back (to life)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, He is Able to bring him back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is certainly able to return him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:8]   Assuredly He, exalted be He, is able to bring him back, to resurrect man after his death; and so when he reflects on his origins, he will realise that the One who was able to do this is also able to resurrect him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! He) i.e. Allah (verily is Able to return him (unto life)) He is able to return that fluid from whence it came and He is Able to bring him back after death and revive him.
